column5: Enjoy the country close to town. A private guest house with a great room, pool table,pool with slide,covered patio,large flat screen TV inside.Big granite island, couches and pull out double futon bed in main area,enclosed bedroom with four bunk beds.Large bathroom with granite counter for two, shower and tub.Sleeps 5 to 6 people.Next to the covered Patio is a Bar-B-Q Pit and a large gas griddle for guests to use or sit around the NEW LARGE FIRE PIT with friends and enjoy.FREE WI-FI
column8: A&M Guest House w/Pool & Large Fire Pit
